ing: 1 teaspoon ground cumin, or to taste
1/4 teaspoon red pepper flakes, or to taste
1/3 cup olive oil, or to taste
des: "Vibrant and fruity, this dressing requires no whisking, drizzling, or machinery of any kind, just a jar with a lid. This 'make and shake' method should be used only if you are going to eat your salad right away."
ins:
Place Dijon mustard, orange zest, cumin, red pepper flakes, orange juice, rice wine vinegar, and olive oil into a jar with a screw top. Add salt and pepper to taste.
Cover jar and shake vigorously for 2 minutes to form temporary emulsion.
